snippet: A heavy dust storm roared into Iran’s capital on Monday, blacking out the sun in a swirling cloud and tearing down trees in a squall that reportedly killed at least four people and injured 30.
lead_paragraph: A heavy dust storm roared into Iran’s capital on Monday, blacking out the sun in a swirling cloud and tearing down trees in a squall that reportedly killed at least four people and injured 30.

headline.main: Dust Storm in Iran Smothers the Capital
headline.print_headline: Iran: Dust Storm Smothers the Capital
